pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 19, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks prior to the Montréal Pride Parade.

Le Centre Sheraton Montréal Hotel
1201 boulevard René-Lévesque Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m. in Salon 6, 3rd floor

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Montréal Pride Parade.

Boulevard René-Lévesque Ouest and rue Stanley

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for Pride accredited media
    • Accredited media should gather at the corner of boulevard René-Lévesque Ouest and rue Stanley no later than 12:30 p.m.
